text:
"Is there a #vaccine against #stigma? #COVID19 will hopefully pass and you will see your privileges restored. This will not be true for the millions of people suffering from prejudices every day of their lives."

UN Volunteer Dao Thu Huong @UNDPVietNam 

🔗https://t.co/CnOT918UHC https://t.co/ah0mSeHqHd
